text: Marcel Junior Loutarila (born April 3, 2000), better known as Koba LaD ("Lah D"), is a French rapper from Évry, Île-de-France. His name Koba is inspired from the fictional character in Planet of the Apes. "LaD" means 'la débrouille, la détaille, la défonce'.LesInrockuptibles: On a interviewé Koba LaD, le jeune loup qui affole le rap français He is signed with Def Jam Recordings.Booska-P: Koba LaD, la nouvelle signature de Def Jam . ==Discography== ===Albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Year ! scope="col" colspan="4"| Peak positions |- ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:90%;"| FRA ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:90%;"| BEL (Fl) ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:90%;"| BEL (Wa) ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:90%;"| SWI |- ! scope="row"| VII | 2018 | 3 || 94 || 2 || 20 |- ! scope="row"| L'Affranchi | 2019 | 3 || 83 || 6 || 13 |} ===EPs=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Year ! scope="col" colspan="1"| Peak positions |- ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:90%;"| FRA |- ! scope="row"| Ténébreux | 2018 | 82 |} ===Singles=== ====As lead artist==== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Year ! scope="col" colspan="3"| Peak positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Album |- ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:90%;"| FRA ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:90%;"| BEL (Wa) ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:90%;"| SWI |- ! scope="row"| "Train de vie" | rowspan="3"| 2018 | 8 | 41 | | rowspan="3"| VII |- ! scope="row"| "La C" | 5 | 49 | |- ! scope="row"| "Oyé" | 24 | 5* (Ultratip) | |- ! scope="row"| "Aventador" | rowspan="10"| 2019 | 26 | 11* (Ultratip) | | Détail |- ! scope="row"| "FeFe" | 29 | 11* (Ultratip) | | Détail |- ! scope="row"| "R44" | 34 | 23* (Ultratip) | | Détail |- ! scope="row"| "EDC" | 36 | | | rowspan="3"| L'affranchi |- ! scope="row"| "Cellophané" | 36 | 17* (Ultratip) | |- ! scope="row"| "RR 9.1" (feat.
